704798f-a.text:
117 to 133 Harrison Avenue, south from Middleton Street to Lorimer Street. Number 121-23 is the former German Evangelical NN.. Church and was used by the congregation as far back as 1886. It was later converted into a synagogue and is used as such at the
time of this photograph.
May, 1929
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection
704798f-a.folder: Harrison Avenue & Middleton Street, Brooklyn, NY

April 20, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

705715f-b.text:
Middleton Street, south from Herrison Avenue. The Tydol gas
station replaced several old frame houses.
P. L. Sperr  September 25, 1941
N.f. corner ofMiddleton St. A Lee Ave., B'klyn.
Sept. 20, 1941
P.L. Sperr, photographer
